name: Amazonian Tree Tower - Defender of the Vine FREE
name_original: Amazonian Tree Tower - Defender of the Vine FREE
description:
****** Free Vine Defense Game! ******

***** Intense bug-blasting action *****

They just keep coming! Hordes of annoying bugs are approaching, and this time they mean business! Your mission is simple - throw everything you have at them and stop them in their tracks. Choose your towers and place them strategically on the enemies’ path. Stand united and fight back!

Features:

* Multiple levels of excitement
* Awesome animations
* Optimized performance
* Smooth and polished gameplay
* Exciting music tracks

Show those nasty bugs what you’ve got!

Download FREE Today!
